sub_title: Customer Care Manager Flow Controls Benelux

profile_positions.description: Provide leadership and manage all activities of the Customer Care teams for flow controls in the Benelux. This encompasses the entire Order Management cycle ensuring we build and provide outstanding service to our customers. In addition to the team based locally in the Benelux, the role is responsible for the teams supporting the Benelux business in our customer service centre Szekesfehervar, Hungary, and other sites as the need arises.
profile_positions.title: Customer Care Manager Flow Controls Benelux

profile_positions.description:
Own and evaluate the work processes. 
Distribute workload & follow up 
Creating & Follow up on the Sales Forecast
Support the team on day-2-day questions/issues
Organize continuous training/updates for the team
Streamline processes towards internal suppliers
Merge BE & NL team into a BNL team
profile_positions.title: Senior Supervisor Customer Administration FCV Benelux

profile_positions.description:
Manages the daily activities of the Customer Administration group in the local and the remote offices. Set the daily priorities for the group and acts as first escalation level internally and externally. Supports the Customer Care manager in forecasting and meeting the targets of period. Coaches and supports the Customer Administrators. Strong focus on improving Customer Loyalty and Satisfaction.

Coordinates the CA group and all relates daily activities. 
Acts as first escalation level and coordinator for customers in case of (delivery) issues.
Optimizes the workload over and sets priorities for local en remote support organizations. Coaches and supports the CA group to become more efficient and improve quality.

Processing complex projects, handling tasks/orders for cross divisional products independently.
profile_positions.title: Supervisor Customer Administration

profile_positions.description:
Manages the daily activities of the Customer Administration group in the local and the remote offices beside my role as Senior Customer Administrator. Set the daily priorities for the group and acts as first escalation level internally and externally. Supports the Customer Care manager in forecasting and meeting the targets of period. Coaches and supports the Customer Administrators to improve their performance and to solve issues during order execution. Strong focus on improving Customer Loyalty and Satisfaction.

Coordinates the CA group and all relates daily activities as order entry, document control, compliancy, change order management and invoicing.
Acts as first escalation level and coordinator for customers in case of (delivery) issues.
Supports the customer Care Manager with forecasting and meeting the sales and finished goods targets.
Optimizes the workload over and sets priorities for local en remote support organizations. Coaches and supports the CA group to become more efficient and improve quality.
profile_positions.title: Order Execution Coordinator Valves and Regulators

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for providing administrative support to the sales team. Processes complex orders. Responds to customer requests and questions regarding technical topics. Large or complex service, products and accounts. Analyzes and consider customer concerns using established procedures

Handles tasks for cross divisional products independently, including complex tasks like projects.
Responsible for complex incoming sales orders delivered on time and according to specification.
Provides full administration of contracts and maintain functional contacts with supervisors and managers, other internal departments, suppliers and customers to produced proposals.
Coordination and coaching of the customer administration and build and maintain relationships with international back offices. Regularly updates the sales administration tools.
profile_positions.title: Senior Customer Administrator

profile_positions.description: Service Leader Assistant is responsible for creating, updating, and managing master data of customers, buildings, equipment and technical installation details. Liaising with customers. Creating and sending out maintenance quotations. The entry and processing of the returned maintenance contracts. Create repair orders and quotes and also determine what costs are charged to the contract. Creating orders for materials and services. Billing based on actual costs, fixed prices and invoicing of maintenance. Manage the planning with regard to periodic inspections, controlling mechanics to perform the inspections and processing of the inspection reports. Making reports regarding failures and maintenance.
profile_positions.title: Service Leader Assistant

profile_positions.description: Coding, booking and payment of all incoming invoices. Keep the supplier database updated. Working in the general ledger (create journal entries and corrections). Clean up of suspense accounts. Monthly, six monthly and annual closings about making accruals and making monthly, half-yearly and annual specifications.
profile_positions.title: Financial Administrative Assistant (Accounts Receiveble)
